episodes.synopsis: National Geographic cameras travel to Iceland, Africa, Japan, California and Greece to record how the huge plates of Earth's crust crash together and spread apart, causing ground-shattering earthquakes and volcanic eruptions.
episodes.title: Born of Fire

episodes.synopsis: National Geographic investigates the awesome power of our water world by journeying into the mind-bending beauty of coral reef shallows to the deepest depths of the Mariana Trench, while glimpsing everything in between.
episodes.title: Ocean Realm

episodes.synopsis: Join National Geographic as we explore how our amazing planet is sculpted. But hold on tight, this is no ordinary view.
episodes.title: Destructive Forces

video.title: National Geographic: Amazing Planet
video.synopsis: This three-part journey explores how Earth took shape through the actions of lava, magma and time, then observes its oceans and other natural powers.
